mapper.insert: insert into missing (missId, missDate, missName, missSex, missClass, missRoom, missNote, missBuilding, missTeacher, missUsername) values (#{missid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{missdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{misssex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missbuilding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missteacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{missusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update missing set missDate = #{missdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missName = #{missname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missSex = #{misssex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missClass = #{missclass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missRoom = #{missroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missNote = #{missnote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missBuilding = #{missbuilding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missTeacher = #{missteacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, missUsername = #{missusername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where missId = #{missid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select missId, missDate, missName, missSex, missClass, missRoom, missNote, missBuilding, missTeacher, missUsername from missing where missId = #{missid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
